superclass: This category is fixed and will not change. It includes clothing, footwear, accessories, and decorations (all non-human wearable fashion items).
subclass: {why} This defines the purpose of the product, such as traditional wear, western wear, casual wear, etc.
subsubclass: {where} This defines the category the product belongs to, such as top-wear, bottom-wear, wall-art, etc.
category: {what} This defines what the product is.
